title: World Trade Center Opens For Business
teaser: Thirteen years after the September 11th terrorist attacks in New York City, Conde Nast is the first business to move into the new skyscraper.
contentencoded:
Thirteen years after the September 11th terrorist attacks in New York City, 1 World Trade Center is opening for business. On Monday, 175 employees of the publishing empire Cond√© Nast will move into the rebuilt skyscraper known as the Freedom Tower. Janet Babin of WNYC joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson with details.

Guest

  • Janet Babin, economic development reporter for WNYC. She tweets @jennababin.
